name: Jean-Eudes Assogba
description: I architect intelligent AI systems and scalable web applications that solve real-world problems.

about.intro: I'm Jean-Eudes Assogba, an AI Engineer and Full-Stack Developer specializing in building scalable, production-ready applications that merge cutting-edge AI with modern web technologies. I architect intelligent systems using GPT-4, Gemini AI, React TypeScript, Django, Python, and advanced AI integrations that solve real-world problems at scale.
about.approach: I design and deploy end-to-end AI systems — from autonomous agents and multi-service AI platforms to enterprise marketplace solutions serving 500+ users. My expertise spans intelligent automation, vector databases, real-time communication systems, and production-grade full-stack architectures with measurable business impact.
about.experience: As Founder of BrollyHub and AI Engineer at RenoSmarter.ai, I've built production AI systems integrating GPT-4o, Gemini AI, Stability AI, achieving 81% accuracy improvements and 40% completion rate increases. Currently seeking opportunities to architect next-generation AI-powered applications where innovation meets enterprise scalability.

experiences.title: Founder & Lead Engineer
experiences.description: Architected and developed AI-powered expert marketplace platform serving 500+ users with React TypeScript frontend and Django backend. Built autonomous AI agent (Brolly AI) capable of frontend navigation, backend function execution, and platform automation. Designed comprehensive real-time WebSocket communication, calendar management, JWT authentication, and complex multi-user workflows.
experiences.ariaLabel: Founder & Lead Engineer at BrollyHub (opens in a new tab)

experiences.title: AI Engineer
experiences.description: Complete rebuild of RenoSmarter.AI platform using modern full-stack architecture. Redesigned legacy Voiceflow system into production Django REST API + React TypeScript platform. Integrated multiple AI services: GPT-4o, Gemini AI, Stability AI, implementing 8-stage renovation workflow with zip code-based pricing, achieving 81% accuracy improvement and 40% completion rate improvement.
experiences.ariaLabel: AI Engineer at RenoSmarter.ai (opens in a new tab)

experiences.title: Frontend Developer & Web Architect
experiences.description: Staff position developing university digital infrastructure. Leading design and development of new university website and digital presence. Built Club Management System adopted by 10+ clubs serving 2,000+ students. Developed automated event scheduling and announcement system, increasing engagement by 50%.
experiences.ariaLabel: Frontend Developer & Web Architect at Rauf Denktas University (opens in a new tab)

experiences.title: Freelance Full-Stack Developer
experiences.description: Independent contractor delivering custom web solutions for diverse clients. Delivered 20+ production websites and web applications using React, Next.js, and Django. Built e-commerce platforms and dashboards resulting in 75% average sales increases for clients. Migrated legacy systems to modern stacks, improving performance by 60% on average. Developed custom CMS solutions with SEO optimization and responsive design.
experiences.ariaLabel: Freelance Full-Stack Developer at Independent Contractor (opens in a new tab)

experiences.title: Senior Teaching Assistant & Technical Mentor
experiences.description: Mentored 500+ computer science students in advanced C++ programming and software engineering principles. Implemented structured learning methodologies and conducted technical code reviews, achieving 94% class success rate (29% improvement) through personalized instruction and industry best practices.
experiences.ariaLabel: Senior Teaching Assistant & Technical Mentor at RDU, TRNC (opens in a new tab)

experiences.title: IBM Certified Full Stack Developer Professional
experiences.description: Completed comprehensive professional certification with 100+ hours of enterprise-grade projects. Demonstrated mastery in React, Python, Django, Flask, Docker, and cloud deployment architectures. Achieved advanced proficiency in microservices, CI/CD pipelines, and scalable application development.
experiences.ariaLabel: IBM Certified Full Stack Developer Professional at IBM via Coursera (opens in a new tab)

list.title: RenoSmarter.AI – AI-Powered Home Renovation Platform
list.description: Django REST API + React TypeScript platform deployed on Render. Redesigned legacy Voiceflow system into production-grade 8-stage renovation workflow. Integrated GPT-4o, Gemini AI, Stability AI for style discovery, cost estimation, and kitchen visualization. Built with Pinecone vector DB, Supabase, Cloudinary, achieving 81% pricing accuracy and 40% completion rate improvement with zip code-based pricing algorithms.

list.title: BrollyHub – AI Expert Marketplace Platform
list.description: Full-stack marketplace serving 500+ users with React TypeScript, Django REST API, and PostgreSQL. Architected autonomous AI agent (Brolly AI) for platform navigation, backend function execution, and workflow automation. Built real-time WebSocket communication, integrated calendar system, comprehensive file management (shelf), JWT authentication, email automation, and complex multi-user session management. Live: https://www.brollyhub.com/

list.title: Aveem University Management System
list.description: Enterprise-grade academic ERP built with React, Django, and PostgreSQL, hosted on AWS EC2. Comprehensive university management covering finance, grading, student enrollment, and notification systems. Serves 2,000+ users with role-based access control, automated workflows, and real-time data synchronization. Architected scalable database schema handling academic records, financial transactions, and administrative processes. Live: https://sys.aveemuni.com/

list.title: Dynamiqtec – Technical Blog & Portfolio
list.description: Multilingual technical blog with 50+ articles on AI, modern web development, and startup insights. Built with Next.js and MDX, featuring automated translation using Gemma API integration. Covers advanced topics: AI workflows, React patterns, full-stack architecture, and industry analysis. Live: https://dynamiqtec.com/

list.title: Spotter – AI-Driven Travel Planning Platform
list.description: Developed an intelligent travel planning application utilizing machine learning algorithms for personalized trip recommendations, interactive visualization, and seamless itinerary management. Built with React, advanced state management, and cloud deployment on Vercel with automated optimization.

list.title: Bookify – AI Book Recommendation Engine
list.description: React + Django platform with 10,000+ book database and intelligent recommendation algorithms. Real-time search functionality with user preference learning, improving retention by 25%. Live: https://jeaneudes-dev.github.io/Bookify/

list.title: SentiFeel – GPT-4 Sentiment Analysis Platform
list.description: React frontend with GPT-4 integration achieving 90% accuracy on 5,000+ text classifications. High-performance interface with real-time processing and data visualization. Live: https://jeaneudes-dev.github.io/sentifeel/

list.title: Readme Converter – Advanced Document Processing Tool
list.description: Created a professional-grade single-page application for markdown-to-PDF/HTML conversion, featuring real-time preview, advanced formatting options, and optimized export functionality. Designed specifically for developers with enhanced performance and user experience.

list.title: AI-Powered Conversational Assistant Platform
list.description: Architected an advanced conversational AI system integrating OpenAI GPT models with React frontend. Implemented context-aware dialogue management, multi-turn conversation handling, and personalized response generation with sophisticated state management and API optimization.

list.title: Journal PWA – Enterprise-Grade Note Management System
list.description: Developed a comprehensive Progressive Web Application for journaling and note management, featuring offline synchronization, encrypted data storage, cross-device compatibility, and intuitive mobile-first design with advanced performance optimization.

ibm.description: Comprehensive full-stack development program covering React, Python, Django, Flask, Docker, and cloud deployment. Completed 100+ hours of hands-on projects and real-world applications.

ai.description: Advanced AI engineering certification focusing on machine learning, deep learning, and AI application development. Specialized in building production-ready AI systems and integrating AI APIs.

certifications.cta: Continuously expanding my expertise through professional development and certification programs.
